verses.1: Pasian in gim hong piakna zia a thuak khin pa kei ka hi hi.
verses.2: Amah in a thuk mahmah khuamial sungah a hong hawl khia hi.
verses.3: Hong hehpih het loin a khut tawh a hong tum niloh hi.
verses.4: Amah in a liam a bai guh kitan sa-in a hong nusia hi.
verses.5: Amah in lunggimna le gentheihna thonginn sungah a hong khumcip hi.
verses.6: Amah in sihna khuamial uih sungah a teeng dingin aana tawh thu a hong pia hi.
verses.7: Amah in kol hong bulh a, taikhiat zawh het lohna kulhpi sungah hong koih hi.
verses.8: Hong huh un, ci-in ka kiko hangin ka kikona aw a pua lamah a kiza zo kei hi.
verses.9: Hoi dangdang ka hih manin suang kulhpite ka kantan zo kei hi.
verses.10: Amah in vompi bangin kei hong buk sim a, humpinelkai bangin a hong bawh hi.
verses.11: Amah in lam pam ah hong delh khia a, a hong balnen khit ciangin a hong nusia hi.
verses.12: Amah in a thalpi keek a, thal tawh kap dingin a hong ngim hi.
verses.13: Amah in a thaltang a thuktum theithei dingin a hong kap hi.
verses.14: Mite in sun tawntung hong nuihsan niloh uh a, leitung bup in ciamnuihna-in a hong nei uh hi.
verses.15: Amah in ka ut lohpipi-in tui kha hong dawnsak a, ka duh lohpipi-in an kha a hong nesak hi.
verses.16: Amah in ka maitang lei ah hong hiat a, suang tungah ka ha a hong tah tansak hi.
verses.17: Lungnopna, cidamna, kipahna cihte bang ahi hiam, cih mel ka thei nawn kei hi.
verses.18: Sau veipi ka nungta nawn kei ding hi. Topaʼ tung pan ka lametna teng a bei ta hi.
verses.19: Gimna ka thuaknate le inn le lo nei loin ka omna pen gu-kha bang hi a,
verses.20: tua pen a tawntungin lungkiatna ahi hi.
verses.21: Ahi zongin ka phawk giugiau thu khat in lametna khat hong nei theisak hi.
verses.22: A bei thei lo Topaʼ hong itna le a hehpihna a kizom paisuak hi a,
verses.23: zing nisuak bangin thaksuak tawntung a, ni a hong suah pelmawh mah tawh a kibang ahi hi.
verses.24: Topa longal neih dang nei lo ka hih manin ama tung bekah lametna ka nei hi.
verses.25: Amah a muangte adingin Topa a hoih hi.
verses.26: Tua ahih ciangin thuak zawhna tawh ngak kenkan zo lehang a hoih pen ahi hi. A hong hotkhiat ding amah ngak ni.
verses.27: Na khangno lai-in thuak zawh hat ding kisin leteh hoih pen hi.
verses.28: Gimna i thuak ciangin dam takin tu hithiatin i thuak zo ding hi.
verses.29: Lametna ding om thei lai ahih manin phunphun huai dek lo hi.
verses.30: Guallelin bawlsiatna thuak ta lehang tua banga om lel ding ahi hi.
verses.31: Topa in hehpihna nei ahih manin hong nial paisuak lo ding hi.
verses.32: Dahna hong thuaksak thei dinga, ahih hangin eite a hong itna muanhuai-in kip tawntung hi.
verses.33: Dahna le gimna a hong thuaksak ciangin amah lungdam pah sam lo hi.
verses.34: Topa in thong sungah i thuak i lunggimnate a hong thei hi.
verses.35: Mite in Pasian thusim loin, i hamphatnate hong paih khiatsakin,
verses.36: zum thukhenna ah a manin thu a kikhen loh ciangin, amah in a hong thei veve hi.
verses.37: Topaʼ deihna bang bekin na khempeuh a piang ahi hi.
verses.38: Ama thupiakna bangin a sia ahi a, a pha ahi zongin a piang ahi hi.
verses.39: I mawhna hangin gim i thuak ciangin bang hangin phunphun ding ihi hiam?
verses.40: I gamtatna sate limtakin ki-enphakikin Topaʼ lamah kiheikik ni.
verses.41: Vantung a om Pasian tungah i lungsim pia-in thu ngen ni.
verses.42: “ Topa aw, nang tungah kong khial uh a, hong leh do kha ka hih manun ka mawhna uh na hong maisak nai kei hi.
verses.43: “Kote nong nung delh a, na hong that khinzo hi. Heh na hih manin na hehpihna a kiseelcip hi.
verses.44: Na hehna, meiipi zahin sah mahmah ahih manin ka thungetna uh na kiang a hong tung zo kei hi.
verses.45: Hih leitungah kote a kihhuai nahteh muat bangin na hong bawl hi.
verses.46: “Ka galte khempeuh un hong simmawhin a hong zahpih uh hi.
verses.47: Siatna bekbek tawh kidimin, kihtakna le launa tawh ka nungta uh hi.
verses.48: Ka mite a kisiat manin ka khitui hawktui luang a bang hi.
verses.49: “Ka khitui kang thei loin luitui bangin luang tawntung a,
verses.50: vantung panin Topa in hong en sukin a hong muh ciangin,
verses.51: ka khuapi kisiatna in ka lungsim hong kitamsak hi.
verses.52: “A thu om lopi-in ka galte in hong mudah uh a, vasa siah bangin thang a hong siah uh hi.
verses.53: Leihawm thukpi kawt sungah hong hing khiat uh a, suangtumpi tawh a hong sincip uh hi.
verses.54: Tui in hong tuumcip gawp ahih manin a si khinta-in ka kingaihsun hi.
verses.55: “ Topa aw, leihawm thukpi taw panin ka hong kiko to hi.
verses.56: Kong thumna hong ngai in, ci-in ka hong thum ciangin na hong za hi.
verses.57: Na hong dawng a, a lau lo dingin thu nong pia hi.
verses.58: “Topa aw, nangmah in na hong huh a, na hong nungtasak hi.
verses.59: A mawkna-in kei hong kimawhsaknate thei khin na hih ciangin thu hong khen inla, kei hong khah khia in.
verses.60: Ka galteʼ hong muhdahna le a vaihawm simna thute uh na thei khinzo hi.
verses.61: “ Topa aw, amauʼ hong simmawhnate na thei khinzo a, a ngimnate khempeuh uh zong na thei zo hi.
verses.62: Sun tawntung keimah bawlsiat ding bekbek kikumin a vaihawm tawntung uh hi.
verses.63: Zingsang a kipan nitak dong a hong zahpih uh hi.
verses.64: “ Topa aw, amauʼ gamtatna bangin thukkik in.
verses.65: Amaute phuisam inla, a cimawh dingin hawl khia in.
verses.66: Amaute delh kek inla, leitung panin nuai mang gawp in,” ci ni.
